entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • How to identify ICU is used in .net 6 and later... #62930
  • CultureNotFoundException in Net6 but works in Net5 on same system #62929
  • First chance exceptions and missing logging when a service isn't given a service name #62923
  • Static abstract methods missing during runtime #62920
    7.0.0
  • Two subsequent build.sh runs produce error #62918
  • JSON Serializer Source Generator doesn't work #62915
  • Is maxstack really necessary? #62913
  • typo in autogenerated cs file #62909
  • NativeAOT missing src/tests/issues.targets changes. #62907
  • SocketsHttpHandler (and WinHttpHandler) do not enforce response Content-Length correctness #62906
    7.0.0
  • Strange RegEx performance in .NET 5 #62902
  • [wasm] MarshalTests.MarshalFailedSynchronousTask fail on NodeJs #62901
    7.0.0
  • JsonSerializer allocates too much memory when serializing html strings #62900
    7.0.0
  • LoggingHttpMessageHandler should log unescaped URL in log message #62894
  • [wasm][debugger] Tests not building on windows due to `PDB0021: Document name doesn't match any pattern in Source Link` #62892
  • Test failure JIT/CodeGenBringUpTests/DblMul_d/DblMul_d.sh #62882
  • Test failure JIT/jit64/opt/cse/hugeexpr1/hugeexpr1.sh #62881
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.Rsa.Tests.SignVerify_Array.InvalidKeySize_DoesNotInvalidateKey #62880

Closed

  • Constructing MD arrays in R2R code does not work on OSX/ARM64 #62747
    7.0.0
  • ConcurrentDictionary.GetOrAdd method executes given valueFactory concurrently #62919
  • [API Proposal]: AppendOnlyList #62841
  • TimeZoneInfo.GetSystemTimeZones() returns an incorrect display name for the Volgograd Standard Time #62912
  • Support bit shifts on long, ulong and uint #62899
  • Tests failing in system.net.security.tests.sslstreamtls13networkconformancetests #62205
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Security.Tests.ServerAsyncAuthenticateTest.ServerAsyncAuthenticate_AllClientVsIndividualServerSupportedProtocols_Success(serverProtocol: Tls13) #62171
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Specific PInvoke call works with AOT but fails on Interp #61156
    6.0.x
  • SslStream: Don't include "NT AUTHORITY" in Distinguished Names list of CertificateRequest. #60949
    6.0.x
  • [SslStream] Dispose seems to call blocking IO #61506
    6.0.x
  • [HTTP] RemoveStalePools should never run in parallel #61505
    6.0.x
  • Inconsistent HttpHeadersNonValidated behavior when response header added to a request #62024
    6.0.x
  • Test failure System.IO.Tests.Directory_Delete_str_bool.Unix_NotFoundDirectory_ReadOnlyVolume #62034
    7.0.0
  • AOT (mono-aot-cross) failure when building maccatalyst-arm64 submission test project #62865
  • Commit the Part6-6 for supporting LoongArch64 CPU #62879
  • Commit the Part6-5 for supporting LoongArch64 CPU #62878
  • Commit the Part6-4 for supporting LoongArch64 CPU #62877
  • Commit the Part6-3 for supporting LoongArch64 CPU #62876
  • Commit the Part6-2 for supporting LoongArch64 CPU #62875
  • Commit the Part6-1 for supporting LoongArch64 CPU #62874
  • Failure in test XML parsing #62844

PullRequests

Created

  • [WIP] Vector64<T>.Zero/Vector128<T>.Zero ARM64 containment optimizations #62933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • corerun: silently ignore directories when building TPA #62932
    area-Host
  • Handle zero-sized unwind fragment candidates #62931
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Have NativeAOT test execution project include SDK #62927
  • Add Pri-0 test suppressions for NativeAOT #62926
  • RPM package needs to create host symlink #62925
    Servicing-consider, area-Setup
  • Increase iteration count in the FinalizeTest #62924
    area-System.Threading
  • [release/6.0] Fix setting timestamp on Windows on readonly files #62922
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, 6.0.x
  • NativeAOT: ICustomMarshaller #62921
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Making user secrets optional by default #62917
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62916
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix source-link test #62914
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Update shared trimming attributes with recently added/used types #62911
    area-System.Runtime, linkable-framework
  • Replace name with type and codepage in EncodingConversionOverflow exception #62910
  • Remove an unused .editorconfig entry. #62905
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move coreclr specific ComponentActivator hosting dependency to coreclr #62903
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, linkable-framework
  • [wasm] Tweak set timeout #62898
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.0
  • Implement the "moffset" encoding size optimization in `emitOutputAM` #62896
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Arm64: Memory barrier improvements #62895
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] JIT/EE interace for getting ABI-info #62893
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [LoongArch64] add all the coreclr-build-config files #62889
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add coreclr-libraries directory. #62888
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add the coreclr/pal and libunwind directory #62887
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-inc,gc, ToolBox directory. #62886
    community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • setInternalRegsDelayFree only for candidate lclVars #62884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove forward-sub for hw intrinsics during inlining #62883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Remove the varargs-based mdarray helper. #62855
    area-ReadyToRun-coreclr
  • Fix duplicated FldSeq in block morphing #62687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update CODEOWNERS #62928
    area-Meta
  • [release/6.0] Fixing regression for AuthType.Anonymous which leads to a NullReferenceException be thrown. #62824
    Servicing-approved, area-System.DirectoryServices, 6.0.2
  • Fix InvokeMember corner case #62891
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Improve compatibility with IL Linker #62890
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] callback to make waiting on module load easier #62904
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core file version #62908
    Servicing-approved, area-Microsoft.VisualBasic, 6.0.2
  • Delete several duplicate test projects under JIT/Methodical #62861
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Undo breaking change in 6.0 in environment variable configuration prefix support #62819
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [wasm] Add support for running debugger tests CI #62431
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Delete `GT_SIMD_CHK` and `GT_HW_INTRINSIC_CHK` #62088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Include Microsoft.NETCore.App.Ref pack as part of 6.0.2 release #62859
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Move 1604 docker based helix queues to 1804 #62871
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0] Fixes #62167. WriteAsync may truncate data if called after .Advance(int) #62348
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Pipelines, 6.0.x
  • [release/6.0-maui] [MonoAOTCompiler] more properties & custom WorkingDirectory #62849
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [wasm] Add a new supported signature for pinvokes #61667
    arch-wasm
  • Directory.Delete: prefer DirectoryNotFoundException over UnauthorizedAccess IOException. #62396
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • [TODO-List-Cleanup] Delete the quirks #61876
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] disable flaky http test on wasm #62852
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Fix Microsoft.VisualBasic.Core file version #62848
    area-Microsoft.VisualBasic
  • Enable NativeAOT in the CI #62833
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add docs around NativeAOT workflows #62837
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • OSR support for Arm64 #62831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Deduplicate JIT/Methodical/explicit/coverage tests #62867
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WinHttp: always read HTTP/2 streams to the end #62870
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Expose Comment in ZipArchive and ZipArchiveEntry #59442
    area-System.IO.Compression, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Convert JIT/Methodical/Array/range Pri0 tests and hook up mobile testing #62752
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-maui' #62850
  • [wasm] Testing with NodeJs on CI #62779
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] updated samples for ES6 and CJS #62292
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1517312 #62663
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Disable some suspicious tests which might lead to OOM crashes on Android emulators and arm64 devices #62767
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Security
  • [release/6.0] Fixing a possible null reference error in WebSocket deflate. #62716
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] fix issue where HTTP2 connection could be scavenged but not disposed #62236
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Add runtime-community.yml pipeline and add s390x job #62808
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 6.0.x
  • [wasm][debugger] Run getter using Runtime.GetProperties #62857
    area-Debugger-mono, needs-author-action
  • [Draft][Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure
  • Port Mono to Raspberry Pi, ship as new linux-armv6 RID #62594
    area-Infrastructure-mono, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [arm64] JIT: Redundant zero/sign extensions after ldrX/ldrsX #62630
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Android] Fix accessing network interfaces information #62780
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Performance optimization of FileSystem.CreateDirectory on windows #62860
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add optimization "X & 1 == 1" to "X & 1" (#61412) #62818
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Refactor FileStatus.Unix. #62721
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Add almalinux support #62184
    area-Host
  • Add ETW events for creation of VSD stubs #62255
    area-VM-coreclr
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] more emscripten asserts for debug build of runtime #62254
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, no recent activity, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Fix AddEventLog: EventLogSettings not added #57567
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, Future
  • Use interpolated strings in place of `StringBuilder.AppendFormat` where possible. #62160
    community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • CI matrix: Add windows 20H2 - fix TLS1.3 issue #62435
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Range Checks for "(uint)i > cns" pattern #62864
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ns2.0 support to System.Formats.Cbor #62872
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, 7.0.0
  • Added DrawRectangle overload accepting RectangleF #62385
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Retrieving packages which is not compatible with the target framework using dotnet list package command #23088

PullRequests

Merged

  • [release/6.0.2xx] Update to 6.0.1 runtimes #23094
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Update System.CommandLine #23085
    Area-CLI
  • Files not ending in css are probably not css files #23086
    Area-Infrastructure
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Servicing-consider, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Proposal]: Avoid synthesizing parameterless struct constructors #5552

Closed

  • Proposal: switch ignore case #1321

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • 'is' operator reports seemingly wrong results for interface over enum array #58378
  • IDE0150 incorrectly flags is object check in Expression<Func<T>> where pattern matching is not supported #58377
  • Delete FatalError.ReportIfNonFatalAndCatchUnlessCanceled #58375
    17.2
  • CodeAnalysis.ChangeNamespace ArgumentException #58372
  • NullableWalker: operator inference shouldn't infer from target typed conditional expresion #58369

Closed

  • Solution checksum are busted when build Roslyn in debug mode #55968
    17.1
  • Dependent assembly ’System.Net.Http‘ version warning flag #58026
  • System.InvalidProgramException when constructing a record struct with parameter list and calling the default constructor #58328
    17.1
  • Test plan for "newlines in interpolations" #57154
    17.1.P1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove OptionSet and Workspace from IVSTypeScriptInlineRenameInfo #58381
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.1 #58379
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Analyzer load failure suppress #58376
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1517172 #58374
  • Merge release/dev16.7-vs-deps to release/dev16.9-vs-deps #58373
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Simplify fault reporting #58367
    Area-IDE
  • Implement GetTypesByMetadataName #58366
    Area-Compilers
  • Call InitializeTelemetrySession on background thread #58364
    Area-IDE
  • Support live diagnostics in source generated files #58363
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #58361
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Update System.Text.Json to 6.0.0 #58365
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • OmniSharp options - take 2 #58355
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • [LSP] Add semantic token caching for solution open #58238
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58380
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58370
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #58205
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Switch to 1ES servicing pools on release/dev16.7-vs-deps #57504
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Report error if 'record struct' constructor calls default parameterless constructor #58339
    Area-Compilers, 17.1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58368
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add update project version fixer for 'newlines in interpolations' #58350
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #58360
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/rename_ui_rework #58362
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Do not throw for user paths that contain a quote character in them. #58357
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Simplify how our FatalError type works and introduce a severity concept #58094
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, Needs UX Triage
  • Make IOperation.ChildOperations public #52923
    Area-Compilers
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Update hosted VS 2017 usage to 2019 #58353
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Null annotate ISymbol.ContainingSymbol #58340
    Area-Compilers
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • SourceLink quality of life improvements #58209
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to a prepared statement to avoid unintentional sql injection. #58359
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WASM: File Upload - MultipartFormDataContent.Add() throws internal Invalid JSON exception #39087
  • UserManager.FindByIdAsync fails when the user is an IdentityUser<int> #39083
  • AddStackExchangeRedisCache & ForceReconnect for Azure App Service Linux containers #39082
  • Is there a way to add metadata to all GET endpoints in ASP.NET Core? #39081
  • Blazor cannot serialize number to string #39080
  • Intercept HTTP errors in SignalR JavaScript Client #39079
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #39077
  • GitHub Codespaces `dotnet run` produces `Failed to authenticate HTTPS connection` Exception #39074
  • Rename Microsoft.AspNetCore.Razor.Internal.Transport package in razor-compiler repo #39072
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Overrided OnAuthorizationAsync function from AuthorizeFilter can't work in customer class. #30025
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Razor Page loses content when running hot reload with watch flag and tailwindcss class change #38971
    Backlog
  • Semi-random JsonException thrown from EndInvokeJS #38962
    7.0-preview1
  • Incorrect nullability warning for razor files #38252
  • System.IO.Pipelines.PipeReader.CopyToAsyncCore: System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException: Specified argument was out of the range of valid values. (Parameter 'start') #38771
  • Blazor WebbAssembly exception when calling javascript function? #39056
  • Localization stopped working in Blazor Wasm after migrating to .NET 6.0 #39076
  • Changing DI instance value in Middleware is not being reflected at other places, where DI of same type is used #37617
    Discussions
  • Configuring Identity page URL for React AspNetCore #38708
    Discussions
  • Dynamic sub-app path for a multi-tenant Blazor Server app #38841

PullRequests

Created

  • Identity stores tests fixes #39088
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Adding EntryAssembly to RazorPagesOptions #39085
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Fix new lines in AssemblyInfo.cs #39084
    area-security, 7.0-preview1
  • Backport Use CDN for .NET Assets to release 6.0 #39043
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.2
  • [release/6.0] Bump up download file timeout #39041
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Don't reuse Pipe buffer when body is read #39071
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Bump site extension versions #39048
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Stop enforcing JSON read till end if `EndInvokeJS` returns early #39060
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • [release/2.1] Move off of expiring machine pools #38536
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • Backport Use CDN for .NET Assets for release/5.0 #39044
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Backport Use CDN for .NET Assets for release/3.1 #39046
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • [WIP] ANCM on ARM64 #38997
  • Reimplement the concurrency limiter middleware to use the new abstractions & implementations #39040
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/5.0] Move to OSX.1100.Amd64.Open #39049
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.x
  • [DRAFT][wasm] dotnet.js modularization #38721
    area-blazor
  • Enable template localization on dotnet CLI #38867
    area-infrastructure
  • Use correct path for NewtonsoftJson ModelState errors #39058
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Translate HRESULT error codes from the DiagnosticClient into human-readable exceptions #2784

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TapGestureRecognizer doesn't call Tap handler when used in a DataTemplate #3796
  • DefaultTextColor is currently only being set for the Android LabelHandler #3795
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • XamlCompilation attribute doesn't appear to be working with .NET MAUI #3794
  • ControlTemplate's loaded from Styles fail to load correctly when not using XAMLCompilation #3793
    6.0.200-preview.12
  • Visual Studio Professional 2022 Preview 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 throwing error on initial app start #3792
  • [WinUI] Border disappears when content placed inside. #3791
  • AppInfo.Guid #3790
  • Support mobile style navigation in .NET MAUI Blazor apps #3789
  • Support deep linking into .NET MAUI Blazor apps #3788
  • [Windows] Application crash when call a DisconnectHandler while remove the view. #3787
  • [Windows] Application crash on touch action with ScrollView and PanGesture #3786
  • [Windows] Cannot create CanvasImageSource #3785

Closed

  • Blazor MAUI - Camera/Microphone Android - NotAllowedError: Permission denied #3694
  • Archiving .NET MAUI iOS apps not working #3777

PullRequests

Merged

  • Flyout apis android #3782
    area/FlyoutPage
  • Remove no longer used LaunchScreen.xib files from templates #3780
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/templates 📄
  • Fix keyboard navigation with modal pages #3631
    area/a11y
  • Execute Screenshot tests on the main thread #3752
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Window flyout handler #3735
    area/FlyoutPage
  • Radiobutton Handler #3784
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Add drag-drop item reordering to CollectionView #3767 #3768
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/collectionview 📃
  • [android] stop using Build.VERSION.SdkInt #3783
    area/perf 🏎️
  • [Catalyst] Fix OnPlatform on macOS #3763
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/Xaml </>
  • Add FormattedText property support to Label in Controls #3637
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Android] Changes to improve Border control drawing performance #3620
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/perf 🏎️
  • Merge 6.0.100-preview11 to main #3750
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #3765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Using + or - operators between DateTimeOffset.Now and a TimeSpan in a query fail #27028
  • RowVersion property incorrectly fails required properties check when using In-Memory provider for unit testing #27027
  • Error on migrating from EF Core 5 to EF Core 6 #27024
  • How to Remove and Insert Data on Middle Table together?? #27023
  • [Bundles] Bundle generation fails with local repositories with relative path in nuget.config #27022
  • sporadically getting System.InvalidCastException #27021

Closed

  • EF Core creates SQL query with ORDER BY at the end massively impacting performance for cases with many included collections #27026
  • Adding Base Type navigation properties leads to many-to-many relationship validation #26982
  • RelationalConnection.Close calls async function #26790
    6.0.2
  • Enable C# strict compiler setting #14502
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Static analysis: protect against mutating fields in hash calculations #27025

Merged

  • Call sync connection close instead of async (7.0) #26942
  • Add Xunit.Abstractions to implicit usings #26996
  • Enable strict compilation #27009
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #27020
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Tweak SaveChangesAsync_accepts_changes_with_ConfigureAwait_true_22841 #27019
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Temporal table support for owned and table splitting scenarios #26935

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Add logic to convert internal repo uris in version.details.xml #12852

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/3.1.4xx #12830
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #12827

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #12839
